ideas.heading: A good life can end in lonelyness and betrayal

subideas.text: Know that brother Tymothy aws released from prison, with whom if arriving soon, I'll go with to see you

As you might notice, Timothy was also imprisoned. The mention of Tymothy, plus the lack of Paul mentioning on the letter, plus the incredible difference in style and focus of this letter with Paul's letters, suggests me that maybe Paul is dead at this point, and that Tymothy persevered as instructed in 2 timothy

As you know, all that are in Asia turned their back on me, among whom are Figelo and Hermogenes. That the Lord grants mercy to the house of Onesiphorus, because many times he consolated me and didn't was ashamed by my chains. Rather, when he was in Rome, seeked me with haste and found me. That the Lod grants that he finds mercy from the Lord in that day. Besides, the services that he gave in Ephesus you know them better

ideas.heading: The Key to overcome lonellyness is true faith in our Savior

subideas.text: His disciples said to Him: 'Now you speak clearly and dont use figurated language. Now we understand that you know all things, and dont need that nobody asks you; because of this we believe that you came from God'

Jesus answered: 'Now you believe? Look, the hour is comming, and it has arrived, in which you'll be scatered, each one by his way, and you'll leave me alone; nonetheless I'm not alone, because the Father is with me. This things I've told you so that in Me you have peace. In the world you'll have tribulation; but trust, I've defeated the world'
Our savior handled his lonelyness through his relationship with the Father
To this lonelyness was added the profound grief for the betrayal of Judas. As we reed on John 13:
There is a sense, in which His relationship with the Father was like ours
He even had to fight his thoughts and emotions trough relentless prayer to endure
This is the secret. Only those who really love him and obey him, will trust, and follow Him through fire
But please beloved, dont let that your lifestyle fool you. We dont love Jesus because you dont commit publicly repudiated sins
We know that we love Him because we obey Him
We know that we love Him when we truly lay down our life in concrete actions to build up our brothers. Besides from this, our faith is dead
